Article Title: Kiran Desai is a favorite and US authors make a strong showing on the Booker Prize shortlist
Article Text:
Indian author Kiran Desai (File photo)

LONDON: Booker Prize -winning Indian author Kiran Desai is a favorite to win the coveted fiction trophy for a second time with her first novel in two decades."The Loneliness of Sonia and Sunny" is on a US-dominated six-book shortlist announced Tuesday by a judging panel that includes Irish writer Roddy Doyle and actor Sarah Jessica Parker. The almost 700-page tale of two young Indians making their way in the United States is Desai's third novel and her first since "The Inheritance of Loss," which won the Booker Prize in 2006.Two previous Booker finalists are up for the 50,000 ($68,000) prize again: U.K. writer Andrew Miller for "The Land in Winter," set during an early-1960s cold snap, and Hungarian-British writer David Szalay for "Flesh," which charts one man's life across decades.Three novels by Americans complete the list: Susan Choi's family saga "Flashlight"; Katie Kitamura's tale of acting and identity, "Audition"; and midlife-crisis road trip "The Rest of Our Lives" by Ben Markovits.Doyle - a Booker winner himself in 1993 for "Paddy Clarke Ha Ha Ha" - said the six books tackle big issues, including migration and class, in a "brilliantly human" way."They all follow the human in the stories," Doyle said. "That might seem a bit trite, but I've read novels where I've often felt to myself, if there was a little bit less showing off there would be a good story there.And I don't think any of these books show off."Founded in 1969, the Booker Prize has a reputation for transforming writers' careers. Its winners have included Salman Rushdie, Margaret Atwood, Ian McEwan, Hilary Mantel and Samantha Harvey, who won last year with "Orbital."Past winners have included debut novels - from Arundhati Roy's "The God of Small Things" in 1997 to Douglas Stuart's "Shuggie Bain" in 2020 - but this year's list is dominated by veterans. All the finalists are decades into their careers, and all but Desai have published at least five books."That's the best thing about writing books," said Kiley Reid, author of the novel "Such a Fun Age" and another member of the judging panel. "It's not gymnastics. You don't peak at any age. And seeing authors late into their careers have these wonderful moments, it's really encouraging."Originally open to novels from the U.K., Ireland and the Commonwealth, the prize expanded in 2014 to admit American writers. Worries about an American takeover have largely proved unfounded, though this year's list of six includes three American writers and a fourth, Desai, who has long lived in New York.That's likely to reignite grumbling from some in the U.K., especially since big American fiction prizes like the Pulitzer and the National Book Awards are only open to U.S.-based authors."Well, that's not our only problem" in the U.S., Parker said."As somebody who likes to read globally, I always want more and more diversity," said the "Sex and the City" star, a longtime advocate for reading and literacy. "So I would love all literary awards and competitions to alert readers to great books, no matter where they're from."The judges read 153 novels submitted by publishers, selecting 13 semifinalists and then narrowing that to six during a four-hour meeting. Another meeting looms to pick a winner, who will be crowned on Nov. 10 at a ceremony in London.Parker said it had been a joy to immerse herself in a year of reading, but that cutting books from contention was "real agony.""We all had a couple of books that our heart was broken," she said.
Article Summary: Indian author kiran desai is a favorite to win the coveted fiction trophy for a second time. "the loneliness of sonia and sunny" is on a us-dominated six-book shortlist announced tuesday. The almost 700-page tale of two young indians making their way in the united states is desai's third novel.

Article Text:

like Bill Goldberg.‚Äù

Inside the massive memorial service for Charlie Kirk



"Charlie's murder was not just an attack on one man or one movement. It was an attack on our entire nation."

"a level of heartache‚Äù

A public memorial for Charlie Kirk, a conservative activist, that was held at State Farm Stadium was intended as a solemn honor. Yet, there were moments that overshadowed the proceedings. They transformed a day of mourning into a subject of intense online debate. Many critics are now openly questioning the theatricality of this event, especially the dramatic entrance of Erika Kirk, the grieving widow of Charlie. Their comments on X are now overshadowing the intended purpose of the event, prompting questions online between spectacle and tribute.The spectacle that was part of Erika Kirks‚Äô walk to the podium, accompanied by someimmediately ignited a firestorm on X. Fans and critics have been quick to draw unflattering parallels of this event with grand entrances that can be seen in professional wrestling. A user even called it aA user on X commented,setting the tone for the thread of criticism.Another critic added,said another X user, tryin to mimic WWE ring announcer‚Äôs bombastic style.A sense of disbelief among the online audience after this spectacle was palpable. A user echoing on to many voices said,While another added,The criticism went much beyond the theatrics of the event. Some critics even attributed this entire event to carry sinister motives. A user claimed,A few users didn‚Äôt stop at Erika. They even started to talk about how cheap fireworks being used there were symbolic of the event being sponsored by WWE. The comment on X read,Despite the event being a success, the online critics seem not to shut up with their comments and comparisons.Their sentiments have been similar, arguing about the scale of the event and suggesting this was some significant pre-production.The service in itself was quite a significant event. It drew 10s of 1000s of people to the 63,000-seat State Farm Stadium, located in Glendale, Arizona. The atmosphere therein, reportedly, has been a mix of political rally and mourning, with a very tight level of TSA-level security in the place. Some prominent conservative figures even delivered eulogies, trying to frame Kirk‚Äôs death as an attack on the nation.President Donald Trump also gave a strong political speech. He stated,Even Vice President JD Vance didn‚Äôt stay behind, as he remembered Kirk as hiswho, as per him, treated all with grace. Some other speakers at this event were Tucker Carlson and Tulsi Gabbard, who praised the fearlessness of Kirk and also his commitment to free speech.Against the backdrop of tributes coming from high profile people, Erika Kirk took the stage. In Erika Kirk eulogy, she described witnessingthat as per her, she didn't know it existed. She even shared some details about seeing that faint smile on her husband‚Äôs lips. As per her interpretations it was a clear sign that Charlie didn‚Äôt suffer. Erika concluded the emotional address, publicly forgiving the alleged shooter.For many watching, the speech Erika Kirk gave was eclipsed by the delivery. As per them, this entire thing will surely be remembered more for controversy than as an intended homage to Charlie Kirk.
Article Summary: A public memorial for charlie kirk, a conservative activist, that was held at state farm stadium was intended as a solemn honor. Yet, there were moments that overshadowed the proceedings. They transformed a day of mourning into a subject of intense online debate.

Article Title: "Don‚Äôt call me your wife": LeBron James' wife Savannah James opens up about setting boundaries with the NBA legend before marriage

Article Title: Jason Kelce steals the spotlight playing saxophone for Ravens pregame show
Article Text:
Jason Kelce steals the spotlight playing saxophone for Ravens pregame show (Image Via Getty)

‚ÄúLETS F‚Äî‚Äî GOOOOOO!!! He‚Äôs killin it!!!‚Äù

Jason Kelce‚Äôs musical background and love for playing instruments

‚ÄúI really think playing band and playing music in general has allowed me to excel in sport and other things. The more you practice at it, you will get good. Like, it‚Äôs that simple.‚Äù

Also Read:

Jason Kelce and family perspective on arts and sports

‚ÄúI encourage kids to play as many sports, do as many extracurriculars as you can that you enjoy, because you end up drawing things from each one that is unique and different.‚Äù

Jason Kelce, the former Philadelphia Eagles center, surprised fans on Monday, September 22, when he joined the Baltimore Ravens‚Äô pregame band in Baltimore. The 37-year-old retired NFL star wore a full Marching Ravens uniform and played the saxophone during the warmups before the Ravens‚Äô game against the Detroit Lions. Known for his football career, Kelce showed another side of his talent in front of cheering fans. His brother, Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce, shared the excitement, saying,The videos were shared widely on social media, showing Jason‚Äôs musical skills in action.Jason Kelce has played music since high school. He graduated from Cleveland Heights High School in 2006 and performed in the school jazz band and the symphonic winds ensemble on baritone saxophone, according to CBS Philadelphia.Even during his football career with the Eagles, Kelce combined music with sports, appearing on the Eagles‚Äô Christmas albums.During a podcast episode of New Heights with Travis Kelce, Jason explained why music matters to him:Jason Kelce has always encouraged kids to try different activities. He said,His wife, Kylie Kelce, 33, told Glamour in January 2024 that they are ‚Äúadvocates for the arts‚Äù and hope their daughters also explore music or other creative activities.Fans watching Jason play at the Ravens game got a glimpse of his life outside football, showing he is more than an athlete, he‚Äôs a passionate musician and mentor.
Article Summary: Former philadelphia eagles center jason kelce joined the baltimore ravens‚Äô pregame band in baltimore. The 37-year-old retired nfl star wore a full marching ravens uniform and played the saxophone during the warmups. Kelce has played music since high school and performed in the school jazz band and the symphonic winds ensemble.

Article Title: Dave Portnoy blasts Jake Paul vs Gervonta Davis fight as Netflix clash in Miami sparks ‚Äòclown show‚Äô debate
Article Text:
Dave Portnoy blasts Jake Paul vs Gervonta Davis fight as Netflix clash in Miami sparks ‚Äòclown show‚Äô debate (Image via Getty)

Dave Portnoy rips into Jake Paul vs Gervonta Davis matchup

‚ÄúJake Paul is arguably the greatest marketer of all time. One absolute clown show after another and somehow people keep paying him and showing up. This is insane.‚Äù

‚ÄúI‚Äôm much quicker. He‚Äôs much stronger and much bigger, but taller fighters always struggle against shorter ones.‚Äù

Gervonta Davis and Jake Paul fight rules, venue change and criticism

Jake Paul‚Äôs next boxing show has already been slammed before it even begins. On Monday, September 22, 2025, at a press conference in New York, Paul stood face-to-face with unbeaten champion Gervonta ‚ÄúTank‚Äù Davis. The huge size gap between the two shocked many, including Barstool Sports founder Dave Portnoy, who went online to call the November 14 exhibition fight in Miami, Florida an ‚Äúabsolute clown show.‚Äù The bout will stream live on Netflix from the Kaseya Center.Dave Portnoy took to X (formerly Twitter) after the New York press event, mocking the fight as a money-making stunt. He wrote:The criticism comes because Paul, 6-foot-1 with a 76-inch reach, weighed around 200 pounds in his last fight. Davis, in comparison, is only 5-foot-5 and usually fights at 135 pounds. At the presser, Paul towered over Davis.Jake Paul defended himself, saying his game plan is simple: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm going to use my reach, my size, and keep him away.‚ÄùGervonta Davis, unbeaten at 30-0-1, fired back with confidence:The exhibition fight was first planned for Atlanta, Georgia, but local regulators refused approval.Rick Thompson, chairman of the Georgia Athletic and Entertainment Commission, told USA Today: ‚ÄúThis is the dumbest thing I‚Äôve ever heard. It‚Äôs a money grabber, and I‚Äôm not OK with that.‚ÄùBecause of that, the fight was moved to Miami. The rules also show it is only an exhibition match, so Davis‚Äôs undefeated record will not be affected. Gambling will not be allowed. Judges will still be present to score the bout, so fans will get a winner at the end.Also Read: ‚ÄúWomen In America Were...‚Äù: Martina Navratilova Once Recalled How Chris Evert‚Äôs ‚ÄòGirly‚Äô Look Divided Fans And Rivals Jake Paul (12-1) has fought in similar events before. He beat Julio C√©sar Ch√°vez Jr. last year and also defeated Mike Tyson, who was 58 at the time, in a fight seen by over 100 million people on Netflix. Davis, a world champion at lightweight, has never fought anywhere near Paul‚Äôs weight class before.The fight on November 14, 2025, in Miami will test how far boxing fans are willing to accept the mix of entertainment, streaming numbers, and mismatched opponents.
Article Summary: Dave portnoy blasts jake paul vs gervonta davis fight as netflix clash in miami sparks ‚Äòclown show‚Äô debate. Paul, 6-foot-1 with a 76-inch reach, weighed around 200 pounds in his last fight. At the presser, paul towered over davis, who usually fights at 135 pounds. The bout will stream live on netflix from the kaseya center.

Article Title: Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf combined net worth 2025: Tennis power couple history, fortune, children, legacy and more
Article Text:
Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf combined net worth 2025: Tennis power couple history, fortune, children, legacy and more (Image via Vogue)

Andre Agassi‚Äôs career and earnings

Steffi Graf‚Äôs record and wealth



Andre Agassi and Stefi Graf‚Äôs family life and combined fortune

Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf's tennis legacy



Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf are two of the greatest tennis players in history. Both reached world No. 1. Both won many major titles. Their names are forever linked with the sport. Off the court, they built big wealth through prize money, sponsors, and smart choices. In 2025, their combined fortune is about $290 million.Andre Agassi turned pro at age 16. He quickly became one of the biggest stars of the 1990s. He won eight Grand Slam titles and the 1996 Olympic gold medal. Agassi earned about $31 million in prize money. Sponsorships with Nike, Canon, and more added huge income. Today, his net worth is around $145 million.Steffi Graf is a legend with 22 Grand Slam singles titles. She held the No. 1 ranking for 377 weeks, a record in tennis. She won each Grand Slam event at least four times.Stefi Graf also claimed an Olympic gold medal in 1988. Her career prize money reached $21.9 million. With endorsements and investments, her net worth now stands close to $145 million.Andre Agassi and Steffi Graf married in 2001. They have two children, Jaden and Jaz. Together, their wealth is nearly $290 million. The family lives a private life but often supports tennis.Also Read: ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt Be Greedy‚Äù: Andre Agassi Gives Unexpected Warning To Carlos Alcaraz After Team World‚Äôs Laver Cup 2025 Win In September 2025, Jaden Agassi was seen at the Laver Cup with his girlfriend, cheering for his father. Their daughter, Jaz, also celebrated her dad‚Äôs big moment.Andre Agassi served as Team World‚Äôs captain at the Laver Cup in September 2025. His team beat Team Europe and lifted the trophy.The win brought worldwide attention to Agassi once again. Steffi Graf, meanwhile, continues to focus on family and charity. Together, they inspire millions with their story of success, wealth, and family values.
Article Summary: Andre agassi and steffi graf married in 2001. They have two children, jaden and jaz. Their wealth is nearly $290 million. The family lives a private life but often supports tennis. Together, they inspire millions with their story of success, wealth, and family values.

Article Text: Kobe Bryant, despite his global icon status, deeply admired Dwyane Wade's competitive spirit. Bryant acknowledged Wade as one of the toughest players he ever had to guard, particularly in screen and roll situations. Wade reciprocated the respect, highlighting Bryant's ferocious competitiveness and relentless approach to the game, even recalling instances of Bryant's full-court pressure.

Article Title: NFL power rankings: Where Detroit Lions stand entering Week 4 after big road win
Article Text:
NFL power rankings: Where Detroit Lions stand entering Week 4 after big road win (Image Via Getty)

‚Äúan outstanding team effort.‚Äù

Jared Goff and David Montgomery power Detroit Lions win and climb in NFL rankings

Vinnie Iyer, The Sporting News: Rank 7 (+1)



Rank 7 (+1) Frank Schwab, Yahoo Sports: Rank 5 (no change)



Rank 5 (no change) Nate Davis, USA TODAY: Rank 6 (+4)



Rank 6 (+4) Kristopher Knox, Bleacher Report: Rank 5 (+2)



Aidan Hutchinson and expert reaction after big win

‚Äúfound their offensive roar‚Äù

Also Read:

Jared Goff and the Detroit Lions beat the Baltimore Ravens 38-30 on Monday night, Sept. 22, 2025, at M&T Bank Stadium in Baltimore. The Lions had struggled against the Ravens for years, but this time they dominated. Detroit‚Äôs defense sacked Lamar Jackson seven times, while running backs David Montgomery and Jahmyr Gibbs carried the offense. Coach Dan Campbell praised the group, saying it wasThe win pushed Detroit to 2-1 and tied them with the Green Bay Packers and Minnesota Vikings in the NFC North.The win came on Monday night, Sept. 22, 2025, at M&T Bank Stadium in Baltimore, and it was one of Detroit‚Äôs most complete performances in recent memory.Quarterback Jared Goff ran the offense smoothly, David Montgomery rushed for big gains, and rookie Jahmyr Gibbs found the end zone. On defense, Aidan Hutchinson, Al-Quadin Muhammad, and others combined to sack Lamar Jackson seven times.The Lions balanced the run and pass, controlled the line of scrimmage, and finished their drives with points. The final score was 38-30, and Detroit moved to 2-1 on the season.Aidan Hutchinson‚Äôs pass rush was a turning point on Monday. Analysts across the country gave Detroit credit for their effort. Vinnie Iyer wrote that the Lionsagain after losing at Green Bay.Frank Schwab pointed out that Detroit has scored 90 points in its past two games, calling them a clear Super Bowl contender. Nate Davis praised the strong offense and said Hutchinson‚Äôs play showed the defense is back.Kristopher Knox added that Lions fans should feel confident about their chances in the NFC North. Detroit now prepares for its Week 4 matchup at home against the Cleveland Browns on Sunday, Sept. 28.
Article Summary: Detroit lions beat the baltimore ravens 38-30 on monday night, sept. 22, 2025, at m&t bank stadium in baltimore. The win pushed detroit to 2-1 and tied them with the green bay packers and minnesota vikings in the nfc north. Detroit now prepares for its week 4 matchup at home against the cleveland browns.

Article Title: Cowboys TE Jake Ferguson‚Äôs sweet Instagram comment on Haley Cavinder‚Äôs September photos has fans swooning
Article Text:
Jake Ferguson and Haley Cavinder (Image credits: IG/X)

Haley Cavinder shares candid moments from September adventures

Behind-the-scenes photos reveal her playful, stylish personality

Couple‚Äôs affection shines through custom football gear photos

Jake Ferguson‚Äôs heartfelt comment steals fans' attention instantly

Haley Cavinder shared a glimpse of her September on Instagram , offering fans a mix of stylish photoshoots, candid snapshots with friends, and personal moments. While the post highlighted her vibrant life, it was Dallas Cowboys tight end Jake Ferguson‚Äôs affectionate comment that stole the spotlight, leaving fans delighted over the couple‚Äôs chemistry.Cavinder‚Äôs post included behind-the-scenes photos from a recent photoshoot, capturing her in playful, elegant poses. The candid nature of the images made them feel intimate, giving followers a peek into her daily life. Each photo reflected her unique style while maintaining a sense of authenticity that fans have come to love.Alongside the professional shots, Haley shared Polaroid-style snapshots featuring close friends. These images radiated warmth and joy, highlighting the importance of friendship in her life. The nostalgic Polaroid effect added a personal touch, making casual moments feel special and relatable.One standout photo showed Haley in custom football gear matching Dallas Cowboys colors, a nod to Jake Ferguson. The image of the couple hugging emphasized their bond and playful chemistry. Fans quickly noticed the connection, praising how effortlessly Haley blends style, fandom, and personal life in her posts.Jake Ferguson left a succinct but touching two-word comment: ‚ÄúOh my‚ù§Ô∏è.‚Äù Fans flooded the comment section, celebrating the simplicity and sincerity of his reaction. The brief comment became the focal point of the post, giving followers a rare glimpse into the private tenderness of the high-profile couple.Haley Cavinder‚Äôs September Instagram post was more than a visual diary‚Äîit was a blend of style, friendship, and love, with Jake Ferguson‚Äôs sweet comment perfectly capturing the heart of their relationship.Also read: NFL sends warning to teams about players joining Saudi Arabia flag football event
Article Summary: Haley cavinder shared a glimpse of her september on instagram. The post included behind-the-scenes photos from a recent photoshoot. The candid nature of the images made them feel intimate, giving followers a peek into her daily life.

Article Title: Lions‚Äô Aidan Hutchinson‚Äôs mom becomes unlikely internet sensation during Lions vs Ravens game
Article Text:
Aidan Hutchinson‚Äôs Mom (Getty Images and Instagram)

Aidan Hutchinson‚Äôs mom Melissa Hutchinson ‚Äôs NFL spotlight journey



Beyond football: Melissa Hutchinson‚Äôs passions



Before the Detroit Lions and Baltimore Ravens squared off on Monday night, it wasn‚Äôt just the players drawing attention. Aidan Hutchinson‚Äôs mom, Melissa, became the unexpected star of the evening as social media lit up with her presence. For many fans, this moment wasn‚Äôt surprising‚Äîshe has been a familiar face since her son‚Äôs draft journey in 2022.Melissa first captured the hearts of fans during the 2022 NFL Draft, documenting Aidan‚Äôs leap from Michigan to the professional stage. As a professional photographer, she chronicled every milestone with artistry and emotion. In one heartfelt Instagram post leading up to draft week, she wrote, ‚ÄúOne week until we board that plane to Vegas‚Ä¶ all I can say is meeting and working with some of the most incredibly kind, hard-working, beautifully-spirited people has by far been some of the greatest experiences of my own life. ‚ÄùHer words reflected not only pride in her son but also the gratitude she felt for the entire journey. Since then, Melissa has rarely missed a chance to stand by Aidan‚Äôs side, whether at games or key career moments. On Monday, her presence at Baltimore‚Äôs stadium sparked comments like, ‚ÄúHot Mom alert‚ÄìAidan Hutchinson,‚Äù proving once again that she commands attention in her own right.While football fans often spot her cheering in stadiums, Melissa Hutchinson‚Äôs life extends far beyond the sidelines.She continues to pursue her love for photography, sharing striking images from across the globe. Her work carries the same authenticity that defined her draft posts, blending personal storytelling with creative flair.Fashion is another arena where Melissa shines. In 2020, she became an ambassador for Savvi, an athleisure brand that reflects her style-forward yet approachable personality. Between her photography projects, fashion ventures, and raising three children, she manages to balance artistry with motherhood in a way that resonates with fans.For Aidan, who recently returned to the field after a season-ending injury in 2024, having his mother‚Äôs unwavering support is invaluable. And for fans, Melissa Hutchinson has become more than just an NFL mom‚Äîshe‚Äôs a personality who continues to captivate audiences every time she appears.Also Read: Tom Brady accused of normalizing animal cruelty after controversial ‚Äòkick the dog‚Äô comment, faces PETA criticism
Article Summary: Aidan hutchinson‚Äôs mom, melissa, became the unexpected star of the evening. Melissa first captured the hearts of fans during the 2022 nfl draft. She manages to balance artistry with motherhood in a way that resonates with fans.

Article Title: Why Toronto Maple Leafs goalie Joseph Woll won‚Äôt be with the team right now
Article Text:
Joseph Woll (Image Via Twitter)

Joseph Woll's leave of absence confirmed by Maple Leafs management

Joseph Woll's breakout year and big contract with Toronto

Why exactly is Joseph Woll stepping away from the Leafs just as preparations for the new NHL season shoot into full gear? The 27-year-old goaltender is on a leave of absence to handle a personal family matter; the organization has confirmed his absence, with no timeline presently given for the goaltender to return. Fans observantly wait for further updates on the matter.The announcement came in the morning, just prior to Toronto's scheduled preseason encounter with the Ottawa Senators. General manager Brad Treliving addressed the press, emphasizing the club would respect Woll's privacy and would not provide any further information. Treliving said the team fully expects Woll will return to the roster, but cannot give a timeframe for when that will happen.That statement stood by the situation, asking the media and fans for some respect regarding Woll‚Äôs situation while reminding everyone that the focus was on providing the space Woll needed for his family matters before coming back to the ice. In the meantime, goaltending responsibilities will be shared among the rest of the netminders at camp until the outlook on Woll becomes clearer.This absence just happens to coincide with his breakout year.He played 42 games in the 2023-24 season with the Maple Leafs and posted a 27-14-1 record with a 90.9 save percentage. However, he could not hold the spotlight through the playoffs much after replacing Anthony Stolarz due to a concussion, as he finished with an 88.6 save percentage in seven games versus the Florida Panthers.Earlier this summer, Toronto signed Woll to a three-year, $11 million contract extension beginning this season, expressing confidence in him. Drafted 62nd overall in 2016, Woll has slowly made his way into the NHL, and the franchise considers him to be a cornerstone of its future between the pipes.Also Read: Alex Ovechkin‚Äôs NHL future unclear as he enters his final contract year The timing of Joseph Woll's leave indeed leaves some awkwardly uncertain times for the Maple Leafs, but still, supporting their goaltender remains their primary concern. His breakout year and his new contract emphasize his prominence in the team, and once he returns, Toronto expects him to advance his momentum he created in the last season.
Article Summary: Joseph woll is on a leave of absence from the toronto maple leafs. The organization has confirmed his absence, with no timeline presently given for the goaltender to return. He played 42 games in the 2023-24 season with the maple leafs and posted a 27-14-1 record with a 90.9 save percentage.

Article Title: Super Bowl champ C.J. Gardner-Johnson released by Texans in shocking early-season move
Article Text:
C.J. Gardner-Johnson (Image Source: Getty)

Why the Texans made the move

What‚Äôs next for C.J. Gardner-Johnson

After only three games into the 2025 NFL season, the Houston Texans have released veteran safety C.J. Gardner-Johnson in a surprise move. The decision to cut the DB comes barely a year after he signed a three-year contract with the team to bolster their secondary, but, given his experience, versatility, and leadership in the locker room, the move has stunned fans and analysts alike.Reports suggest that Gardner-Johnson was released partly because of mediocre play and partly because of issues within the building in Houston. Though he had been viewed as a key part of the defensive backfield, his snap count had fluctuated during the first three weeks. Clearly, it's more important to DeMeco Ryans and the Texans' front office staff to develop their younger guys in the secondary than it is to find an established veteran to help in the short term.Houston could change things up a bit during the season, and Gardner-Johnson's release gives them some salary cap flexibility. The Texans are in the thick of the race for the AFC South right now, and the front office clearly is prepared to make aggressive moves to keep them out front.Also Read: Top 5 artists who could perform at the 2026 Super Bowl halftime show Even with this unexpected action, Gardner-Johnson is a top option; thus, he shouldn't be hitting free agency for long. He is a 2022 Super Bowl champion with the Philadelphia Eagles and has made a name for himself as a physical, versatile defensive back who can play safety and nickel corner.Several teams that need veteran leadership and depth in the secondary, including those with playoff ambitions, could come calling. The fact that Gardner-Johnson is an adept, aggressive player who is known to come out of hibernation with impact plays when teams need him most makes him a notable signing for teams looking to build in the mid-term run.The release is just the next chapter in a career that has already seen its share of highs and lows for Gardner-Johnson. How he responds to this newest chapter will go a long way in determining the next chapter of his NFL career, and many in the league will certainly keep a close eye on wherever he resurfaces.
Article Summary: The houston texans have released veteran safety c.j. Gardner-johnson. The move comes barely a year after he signed a three-year contract with the team to bolster their secondary. The texans are in the thick of the race for the afc south right now, and the front office clearly is prepared to make aggressive moves.

Article Title: Patriots fan Bill Simmons slams Bill Belichick‚Äôs public humiliation with Jordon Hudson during shocking UNC drama
Article Text:
Jordon Hudson, Bill Belichick (Getty Images)

Bill Belichick faces mounting pressure after UCF loss



AI distractions overshadow UNC‚Äôs on-field reality



It used to be a lighthearted storyline, but now the situation surrounding Bill Belichick at North Carolina feels more troubling. The legendary former New England Patriots coach, now 73, has stumbled badly in his first month leading the Tar Heels. A 34-9 blowout loss to UCF dropped his team to 1-3, leaving fans wondering if this experiment is unraveling faster than anyone imagined.Belichick‚Äôs transition to college football was never going to be simple, but the early signs have been brutal. Three lopsided defeats in four games have tested both his legacy and patience. Adding to the drama is his 24-year-old girlfriend, Jordon Hudson, whose constant presence on the sidelines and in the tunnel after games continues to stir debate. Her visibility has become part of the conversation around Belichick‚Äôs tenure, whether he likes it or not.Sports media voices have not held back. Bill Simmons, speaking on The Bill Simmons Podcast, admitted his dismay at watching his football hero endure such struggles. "[Me and] all my Pats fans, we're just like, 'wow'," Simmons said. "Could this be going worse? Like this is the greatest NFL coach of all time. This has been the most humiliating year ever.He's getting his a* kicked in these games. He's got this 25 year old coming on the sidelines when he's trying to coach. Like, how did he get to this point?"*As if defeats weren‚Äôt enough, digital noise has made the situation even murkier. A viral AI-altered video appeared to show Belichick and Hudson sharing a sideline kiss. The clip, viewed nearly 5 million times, later proved fake. Yet it only intensified the circus, leaving the on-field product overshadowed by online chatter.For now, UNC fans are desperate for wins, not memes. But until Belichick finds a way to stabilize the Tar Heels, his coaching comeback may remain defined less by football and more by the noise surrounding it.Also Read: Chiefs‚Äô Travis Kelce and Andy Reid get into fiery sideline argument on live broadcast: Is everything going well between these two?
Article Summary: Bill belichick's north carolina tar heels are 1-3 after a 34-9 loss to ucf. A viral ai-altered video appeared to show belichick and hudson sharing a sideline kiss. The clip, viewed nearly 5 million times, later proved fake.

Article Title: ‚ÄúMy son thinks I can do anything‚Äù- Jayson Tatum reveals how his kids Dylan and Deuce helped him stay positive during Achilles tear recovery
Article Text:
Jayson Tatum (Image via Getty Images)

Jayson Tatum reveals how his kids helped him keep his spirits high during his Achilles tear recovery

Boston Celtics star Jayson Tatum made headlines during the 2025 NBA playoffs in May. The 27-year-old power forward ruptured his Achilles tendon which forced him to take a backseat during the playoffs. Tatum opened up on his gruelling recovery and how his sons Dylan and Duece helped him stay positive during one the toughest time of his life.The Boston Celtics‚Äô power forward recently appeared for an exclusive interview with reputed media outlet People. The NBA star opened up on his gruelling recovery, support of his parents and most importantly how his kids Dylan and Deuce helped him stay positive during one of the most difficult periods of his life. Tatum revealed asking his son whether he would be to make a comeback, to which Deuce confidently replied,‚ÄúDumb question, of course. I really needed that. There have been plenty of moments during this when I doubted myself. My son thinks I can do anything.‚ÄùJayson Tatum mentioned his kids were no less than a silver lining in the dark clouds. The Celtics star shares 14 month old Dylan with British singer Ella Mai. He welcomed his son, Deuce, with ex-girlfriend Toriah Lachell in 2017. The NBA star revealed little Dylan was fascinated by the boot he wore after surgery"He always would make noises at and try to touch it when he saw it. Dylan got to nap a bunch on Daddy's chest on the couch.‚ÄùTatum further added,‚ÄúIt‚Äôs been a long journey. I‚Äôm on the road to getting back. And it‚Äôs the hardest I‚Äôve ever worked in my life.‚ÄùDue to Jayson Tatum‚Äôs restricted movement, 14-month-old Dylan used to sleep on his chest. According to Tatum‚Äôs revelation, when he started losing hope about his comeback to the basketball court, his kids were his biggest cheerleaders. Both Dylan and Duece played a very important role in their dad's NBA comeback.Also Read: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm the Achilles guy‚Äù- Kevin Durant draws from his experience and offers words of encouragement to fellow NBA stars Jayson Tatum and Tyrese Haliburton facing similar issue
Article Summary: Boston celtics star jayson tatum made headlines during the 2025 nba playoffs in may. The 27-year-old power forward ruptured his achilles tendon. Tatum opened up on his gruelling recovery and how his sons dylan and duece helped him stay positive during one the toughest time of his life.

Article Title: 'Flirty' or forced? Brittany Mahomes‚Äô glam team explains game day look as Patrick Mahomes' Chiefs struggle
Article Text:
Brittany Mahomes‚Äô ‚Äòflirty‚Äô glam steals the spotlight as Patrick Mahomes secures Chiefs‚Äô first win. (Image via Getty)

Brittany Mahomes and Jackson Mahomes turn heads on the sidelines during Patrick Mahomes‚Äô win over the Giants



Kansas City Chiefs offense boosted by Tyquan Thornton but Patrick Mahomes still faces pressure to improve



Brittany Mahomes‚Äô glam team broke down her full game day look on Sept. 21 while she supported husband Patrick Mahomes during the Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô win over the New York Giants. The breakdown came from hairstylist Laurabeth Cabott and makeup artist Bex Pichelmann, who shared the exact routine they used on Instagram the next day.Pichelmann revealed that Brittany‚Äôs skin was prepped with iNNBeauty Project‚Äôs extreme cream before applying Dior Beauty‚Äôs Forever Glow Foundation. She added Glossier Plus Blush in puff and lined Brittany‚Äôs lips with Makeup by Mario‚Äôs Almond pencil before finishing with Anastasia Beverly Hills gloss. For her eyes, she used the Hung Vanngo Beauty palette, blending a bronze shade across the crease and adding shimmer in the corners. Brittany‚Äôs lashes were topped off with Lilly Lashes‚Äô Scene Stealer Half Lash.Cabott teased Brittany‚Äôs platinum crown to create volume, pulled her hair into a ponytail, and curled the ends with a GHD 1-inch iron. Mane heat protectant spray and Davines texture spray locked the style in place. Brittany‚Äôs outfit was all white with a red floral purse that matched the Chiefs‚Äô team colors.While Patrick Mahomes fought for his first victory of the 2025 NFL season, Brittany Mahomes drew attention away from the field.She posed on the sidelines with Patrick‚Äôs brother, Jackson Mahomes, who posted the photo with the caption ‚ÄúSNF‚Äù and a football emoji. Brittany responded with fire emojis, sparking a round of fan comments on social media.Patrick Mahomes finished the night with 224 passing yards, one touchdown, and 22 completions. Wide receiver Tyquan Thornton became his key target, catching five passes for 71 yards and scoring once. Thornton also grabbed a 33-yard pass in the fourth quarter to seal the win after an earlier touchdown was called incomplete.Thornton‚Äôs rise comes at a critical moment for the Kansas City Chiefs, who are still adjusting to injuries and suspensions at wide receiver. His speed and timing with Patrick Mahomes have given Kansas City a new option in the passing game. Head coach Andy Reid praised his quarterback, saying, ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs how he rolls. ‚Ä¶ It seems like every week he does something like that. The guys know that he‚Äôs all in.‚ÄùEven with the win, the performance left questions. Analysts have pointed to a decline in Patrick Mahomes‚Äô production compared with past seasons, and fans noticed hesitation on a throw to tight end Travis Kelce against the Giants. The Chiefs now prepare for the Baltimore Ravens in Week 4, where the offense will be tested against a stronger opponent.
Article Summary: Brittany mahomes‚Äô glam team broke down her full game day look on sept. 21 while she supported husband patrick mahomes during the kansas city chiefs‚Äô win over the new york giants. The breakdown came from hairstylist laurabeth cabott and makeup artist bex pichelmann, who shared the exact routine they used the next day.

Article Title: ‚ÄúNot trying to ‚Äòglaze‚Äô at all‚Äù: Golf YouTuber predicts big wins for Max Homa after swing analysis
Article Text:
Image via: Getty

Horvat calls Homa's swing "unbelievably slotted"



A difficult 2025 so far

Remarks from the swing coach

Can I Beat Max Homa if I Start 5 Under Par?

There are no lifts remaining for Max Homa on the PGA Tour, though his play continues to generate interest. The latest cheer came from Golf YouTuber Grant Horvat, who recently shared Homa's mechanics in a viral video on X.In the clip, Homa can be seen rattling out a tee shot with his driver and calmly walking off toward the greens. The whole thing impressed Horvat, not just the swing-angle control Homa displayed in practice.‚ÄúNot trying to ‚Äúglaze‚Äù at all. However, Max‚Äôs swing is so unbelievably slotted right now. I witnessed him only miss 1 fairway and his irons and putter were dialed. I think he‚Äôs gonna have a great year.‚ÄùConfidence from outside observers about Homa‚Äôs potential reveals just how much belief is still there, notwithstanding the fact that a player has not won in two seasons.Homa has played in all four majors this year but unfortunately the results have not met expectations. His best chance came at the PGA Championship, although he ended up tied for 60th. Without any wins to boast about, his entry to the highest echelons is mostly because of his consistency and sheer technical ability.At the conclusion of the PGA Championship, Homa‚Äôs longtime swing coach and distinguished teaching professional, John Scott Rattan, also shared thoughts about his pupil‚Äôs form.Rattan said that Homa‚Äôs fundamentals are still good, though the results haven‚Äôt caught up just yet. He stressed patience and suggested that just a couple of minor changes might be all it takes to get small misses into leaderboard rallies as soon as the next events come around.Having failed to make Team U.S. this week in the Ryder Cup, Homa has taken this period as an opportunity to work even more on his game. Throw in a glowing review from a famous YouTuber, and the old-school belief once more creeps in that the 34 year old Californian might be ready for another breakthrough.If Horvat's forecast holds, then a comeback could turn into an actual season, putting Homa back in the ranks of the Tour's greats in 2026. Meanwhile, all golf fans are waiting for is possibly another swing" from him, that "slotted" season, according to Horvat, being the one that takes momentum into trophies.
Article Summary: Golf youtuber grant horvat calls max homa's swing "unbelievably slotted" homa has played in all four majors this year but unfortunately the results have not met expectations. Swing coach john scott rattan said that homa‚Äôs fundamentals are still good, though the results haven't caught up just yet.

Article Title: LeBron James‚Äô Silence Adds Drama to Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô NBA 2025-26 Season Plans
Article Text:
LeBron James (via Getty Images)

LeBron James‚Äô agent Rich Paul urges fans and critics not to worry about his future

LeBron James yet to reflect on Los Angeles Lakers new roster



As NBA training camp approaches, speculation about LeBron James ‚Äô future with the Los Angeles Lakers continues to grow. ESPN insider Shams Charania recently reached out to Klutch Sports founder Rich Paul for clarity on the issue. Earlier this offseason, Paul suggested James could consider leaving if the Lakers did not improve the roster. Since then the team has added new stalwarts, but it is still unclear if that satisfies James‚Äô championship hopes.Reportedly, LeBron James was worried at the start of summer that the Los Angeles Lakers would focus more on Luka Doncic. To support the Luka-LeBron pairing, the Lakers signed DeAndre Ayton, Marcus Smart, and Jake LaRavia.Shams Charania said, ‚ÄúI think the other thing that sits here as well is Bryce James is gonna start his freshman year at college. How does he look in that prospect? How does he play into the 2026 NBA Draft? These are the things that LeBron James is open-minded about.‚ÄùWith all the questions about his future, his agent Rich Paul said people should focus on the present. According to ESPN‚Äôs Shams Charania, Paul said, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs important not to worry about the future when it comes to LeBron James. Just appreciate the present.‚ÄùLeBron James added more fuel to speculation by using his $52.6 million player option for the next season.Many think he might ask for a trade later if the Lakers are not competing for a championship and join a contender instead.So far, James has not shared his views on the Lakers‚Äô offseason moves. ESPN‚Äôs Shams Charania noted that LeBron‚Äôs opinion on these changes could shape his next steps. But there may also be another factor in play.Also Read: Former NBA Star Reveals Why Kobe Bryant Was A Better Player Than LeBron James LeBron James already made history by playing with son Bronny James last season. In another record, he is now entering his 23rd NBA year. If he plays until 2026, he could share the court with Bryce. For now, as his agent said, it is best to just enjoy the moment!

Since then the team has added new stalwarts, but it is still unclear if that satisfies james‚Äô championship hopes.

Article Title: NHL Trade Rumors: New Jersey Devils‚Äô Luke Hughes holdout continues as preseason begins
Article Text:
Getty Images

Luke Hughes holdout continues during contract standoff with insight from NHL insider Elliotte Friedman

32 Thoughts Podcast

‚ÄúAs far as I heard on Sunday night, nothing had changed on Luke Hughes, that there was still a bit of a gulf there and they were still working on a long-term deal,‚Äù

‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs collusion or anything like that; but I definitely think there is a ‚Äòwe have to hold the line‚Äô to some level.‚Äù

Ongoing negotiations and what lies ahead for Hughes

As the New Jersey Devils kick off their preseason, defenseman Luke Hughes remains unsigned, extending his holdout into the start of training camp. The 22-year-old, considered one of the team‚Äôs top defensive prospects, is reportedly in contract negotiations with the Devils for a long-term deal. Both sides remain at an impasse over the average annual value, creating uncertainty around Hughes‚Äô participation in upcoming preseason games.The holdout has drawn attention not only for its timing but also for its broader implications on NHL contract negotiations. On the latest(9/22), Elliotte Friedman discussed the situation, highlighting a trend among re-extension eligible stars.Friedman said. Regarding the NHL landscape, he added,The Devils and Hughes‚Äô camp remain focused on structuring a contract that reflects Hughes‚Äô potential as a top-tier defenseman while also adhering to the team‚Äôs salary-cap strategy. Hughes previously missed the first five days of training camp, surpassing last season‚Äôs holdout by Dawson Mercer.The core of the disagreement lies in Hughes‚Äô long-term value versus the team‚Äôs approach to the rising NHL salary cap. Hughes‚Äô agent, Pat Brisson, is reportedly advocating for compensation that reflects Hughes‚Äô ascension as the team‚Äôs future No.1 defenseman, while the Devils aim to manage cap flexibility in a changing market.Even if Hughes does not secure a roster spot immediately, he remains committed to the Devils organization. Analysts note that the passing of the torch from Dougie Hamilton to Hughes may have already begun, as Hughes assumed PP1 duties last season. Until an agreement is reached, Hughes will continue to sit out, and the preseason games will proceed without him.Luke Hughes‚Äô holdout underscores the growing complexities of NHL contract negotiations in the era of rising salary caps. With both sides showing commitment but remaining firm on key points, the situation is a high-stakes negotiation that will shape not only Hughes‚Äô career but also the Devils‚Äô defensive future. Analysts and fans alike will be watching closely as discussions continue.Also Read: Toronto Maple Leafs prospect Ben Danford stands out against Ottawa Senators
Article Summary: New jersey devils defenseman luke hughes remains unsigned, extending his holdout into the start of training camp. The 22-year-old, considered one of the team‚Äôs top defensive prospects, is reportedly in contract negotiations with the devils for a long-term deal. Both sides remain at an impasse over the average annual value.

Article Title: "Career flashed before my eyes"- Jayson Tatum opens up on Achilles tear as Boston Celtics await his return
Article Text:
Jayson Tatum gives much needed update on his injury (Image via Getty Images)

Jayson Tatum‚Äôs future in doubt as Boston Celtics star details emotional battle after Achilles tear

Jayson Tatum stays active in rehab as Boston Celtics monitor recovery from Achilles tear

In Game 4 of the Boston Celtics ' second-round playoff loss to the New York Knicks last May, forward Jayson Tatum tore his Achilles tendon. Amidst all this, finally he talked candidly in an interview with People Magazine about his injury. After rupturing his Achilles, he claimed to have sobbed for two hours, wondering if Boston would trade him, whether his career would end, or if he would lose all of his endorsement deals. Jayson Tatum 's status for next season is uncertain following his severe Achilles injury in the Boston Celtics' 2025 playoffs series with the New York Knicks. In the last minutes of an NBA playoff game, the Celtics' player made a step forward and fell on the ground, screaming in pain, after rupturing his Achilles tendon.Speaking to People Magazine about his injury, Tatum claimed that he was distraught in the locker room as he was talking with his mother, Brandy Cole, and his trainer. He further said:"I literally sat there and cried for two hours 'cause so many things ran through my mind: 'Damn, is my career over? Am I going to get traded? Are all my partners going to drop me?' My basketball career flashed in front of my eyes.. I‚Äôm in my prime, one of the best basketball players in the world, and it felt like it was all taken away."He continued said:"That is the million-dollar question‚Ä¶ I think for me, and my team, the doctors, the organization, the most important thing is making a full recovery. Being back 100%. Not rushing it. But I haven't said like, 'Yo, I'm not playing this season,' or anything like that."Talking about his goal in mind, he then said:"I have a goal in my mind.. What I will say is, I'm not working out, rehabbing six days a week for no reason."Meanwhile, shortly after this, Darren Hartwell of NBC Sports Boston talked about Tatum and his injury and said:‚ÄúThe Celtics are very happy with how hard Jayson Tatum has been working at his rehab, and his level of focus and intensity in the rehab process‚Ä¶ (Tatum) did not leave town. He has been here the entire time. ‚Ä¶ Since the injury, he has not left town and he has been inside the building at the Celtics‚Äô facility with their people and their team almost every single day for months.‚ÄùIn Game 4 of the Boston Celtics' second-round playoff loss to the New York Knicks last May, forward Jayson Tatum tore his Achilles tendon. He is currently undergoing a protracted recuperation. As he prepares to return to the court, the star has apparently been a regular at Boston's Auerbach Centre this summer.The recovery period from an Achilles rupture would normally take up most, if not all, of a season. Tatum's recovery has been chronicled by the Celtics, who have posted footage of him working out on social media. He went to New York Patriots' practice in August without wearing any kind of brace or walking boot. From his social media photos, it seems like he is doing much better now.Also read: Jayson Tatum debuts new hairstyle at Bradley Beal‚Äôs recent wedding pictures while pushing through Achilles rehab
Article Summary: Boston celtics forward jayson tatum tore his achilles tendon last may. He is currently undergoing a protracted recuperation at boston's auerbach centre. Tatum spoke candidly about his injury in an interview with people magazine. He claimed to have sobbed for two hours, wondering if boston would trade him.
